description: This is a market on the total sales that the digital artist Pak will generate during “The Fungible” auction. The auction is scheduled to take place from April 12 to April 14, 2021, in collaboration with Sotheby’s and NiftyGateway. This market will resolve to whichever bracket contains the total value of all the items sold during Pak’s “The Fungible” auction. The total value of all items will be the sum of sales (in USD) from both The Fungible Open Edition and The Fungible Collection auctions. Total sales will only include primary sales, and not any sales on secondary markets. This market will resolve as soon as all auctions end and total sales data can be calculated. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, this market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

markets.outcomes: ["Less than $20M", "$20M to less than $45M", "$45M to less than $70M", "$70M or more"]
markets.question: What will Pak’s Sotheby’s auction generate in total sales?

title: What will Pak’s Sotheby’s auction generate in total sales?
